text:
When I am developing a package or entering in dev environment using
`dev package_name`
I am getting the following error:
```ERROR: The following package names could not be resolved:
 * package_name (not found in project, manifest or registry)```

elements.text: When I am developing a package or entering in dev environment using
I am getting the following error:

ERROR: The following package names could not be resolved:

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/57019| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
Which package are you trying to develop?

elements.text: Which package are you trying to develop?

text: I am working on Clustering methods.

elements.text: I am working on Clustering methods.

text: Yeah, so if it’s waiting for registration I dont think you can dev it just yet

elements.text: Yeah, so if it’s waiting for registration I dont think you can dev it just yet

text: you can dev it with URL though, just not by the name alone

elements.text: you can dev it with URL though, just not by the name alone

text: Hey <@U0140JW97SP>, if you were able to find an answer here on Slack, please cross post it to Discourse via the link above. Thank you!
